comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I fooled around with Google Maps / Earth and Shark and Clark Islands, coming up with a location near the junction of New South Head Road (see electric tram) and Clairvaux Road in Vaucluse - g.co/maps/55pem . Opinions?

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Hi beachcomberaustralia - you are spot on with that one! This image is taken from Vaucluse.
